column5: Yup, everything is ready, me  , boat . Everything is tested , checked and tested again  For a change    I will try to catch some crappies on Scugog ( still have no idea how to find them   , but I will be on the water   anyway. I've decided to start later ( 2-3 pm) from the tip of an island. Hopefully I will have something to report If anybody will be on Scugog say Hi ( I will monitor CH 19 on FRS radio ) Good Luck to all

I'll see you out there at about 9 am.  Good Luck !!  Turkey hunt from 4:30am till 9am, panfish from 9am to 1pm, then up to the In-laws farm for 2am, drop the wife off, and I'll head on to Gull lake to try for Lakers.  It's a hard life but somebodys' got to do it.  Good luck to you.  Entropy
I wish it was mine "work schedule"  :thumbsup_anim:  :lol:

Bly and I should be ready by tonite as well.  We've been looking foward to our first trout opener for weeks now...sleep may be an issue for us as well!!  Oh well, if we cant sleep, we'll just go fishing at 5am then...LOL.
I cant wait either... Just hope my river isn't washed out
i aint caught a trout in ages so i'm ready to go too!!! (dam split personality) lol good luck all and remember to let some swim!!! hurry up monday  lol

i gotta go meet the minister for my wedding tomorrow morning in Grimsby, then off to a nice little trout stream i know and i'm betting i won't see a soul, can't wait for some nice scrappy little brookies... then i'll top the night off catfishing  lol
